1506.name: SG CuMn13Al7
1506.Applications: Joint welds or building up of aluminum bronze. Cladding components undergoing metal to metal wear under high pressure. Especially suited for marine environments. The addition of manganese and nickel improves hardness and strength. Excellently suitable for joining and cladding of copper alloys, unalloyed and low-alloy steels and grey cast iron
1506.Suitable_For: Ship propellers, copper, brass, pumps, seawater, desalting equipment, marine, pulling tools, shafts, guide grooves, sliding surfaces, cast iron, pully, UNS : C62300 - C63000, DIN : CuAl10Fe3Mn2 - CuAl10Ni5Fe4 - G-CuAl10Fe, Mat n° : 2.0936 - 2.0966 - 2.0940, CuNiAl, superston etc..
